If all our workers were so situated that they could spend a few hours each day in outdoor labor, and felt free to do this, it would be a blessing to them; they would be able to discharge more successfully the duties of their calling. If they have not time for complete relaxation, they could be planning and praying while at work 
214
with their hands, and could return to their labor refreshed in body and spirit.—(Gospel Workers, 240.)
